issue.title: [C++] Create GcsFileSystem skeleton
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-14222](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-14222). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Implement a skeleton for GCSFileSystem. All functions would return `Status::NotImplemented()`. This will keep the future changes smaller, and allow me to verify all CI builds are working in a smaller PR.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-14222?focusedCommentId=17426429) by Kouhei Sutou (kou):*
